ygData.subject: Re: RE: RE: Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Varsoon was around when I was a newbie.  He killed me a few times too.  I m glad he s back, I was pretty upset that I d never get retribution! Anthem
ygData.messageBody:
>I think you might be missing the point here. Qeynos Hills, which was the
>other undead spawn area, and Kithicor (to a lesser extent, were mostly for
>newbies btw 4-7 level. So said newbie in Qeynos heads for his normal
>hunting grounds and BAM, Varsoon the undying hits you for 47pts of damage.

Varsoon was around when I was a newbie. He killed me a few times too. I'm
glad he's back, I was pretty upset that I'd never get retribution!

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 39 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
